full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set with Stand, 1kg, 1.5kg, 2kg Pairs (6 Dumbbells Total), Colorful Hex Hand Weights for Women & Men, Odor-Free Non-Toxic Coating for Home Gym Workouts
